Articles.Content:
Who cares about SWDennis? Let's do our own.

Requirements:

  • BD Armory
  • Station building abilities
  • A computer that is not a potato (sorry me)
  • A few more mods, no remaking mods (like CSS)

Normal mode: A station the size of 4 International Space Stations. It must have a turret so you can shoot the giant 1.1 hype.

Hard mode: Build an artificial gravity station 8 times the size of the ISS, with the requirements above.

Super-Hard Mode: Impress me.

Go.
